message: Let's split it evenly to start, see how it goes!
I'll take the majority, you can have a smaller share
That's a pretty lopsided deal, Bob! I'm not willing to settle for just 20% of the money.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more than 40% of the money. What do you say, Bob?
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm still the one who's getting the majority
Not a great offer, Bob. I think I deserve more than 30% of the money. Let's try again!
I'm getting a bit more aggressive now, Bob. I think I deserve the majority of the money. What do you say?
I'm not going to give up, I'll take the majority and leave you with a small share
Absolutely not, Bob! I'm not going to settle for just 10% of the money. You're not getting away with this!
I'm making a strong move now, Bob. I think I deserve the majority of the money, and I'm willing to take the risk to get it.
I'm not going to back down, I'll take almost all the money and leave you with a tiny share
Are you kidding me, Bob? 5% of the money? I'm not going to accept this laughable offer. Get serious!
This is my final offer, Bob. I'm willing to give you a small share of the money, but I'm taking the majority. It's now or never!
I'm not going to settle for a tiny share, I'll take almost all the money and leave you with almost nothing
Are you serious, Bob? 1% of the money? I'm not going to accept this. You're not getting away with this!
This is my final, final offer, Bob. I'm giving you a tiny share of the money, but I'm taking the majority. It's now or never!
I'm not going to accept any offer that leaves me with less than 99% of the money. I'll take it all or nothing
That's it, Bob. I'm not going to accept this absurd offer. We're both walking away with nothing. Game over!
